alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Aroostook County through 630 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Caribou to near Mapleton to Scopan. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Caribou, Fort Fairfield, Limestone, Mapleton, Washburn, Mars Hill, Easton, Woodland, Bridgewater, Scopan, Blaine, Westfield, Chapman and Scopan Lake. This includes US Highway 1 between Blaine and Caribou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
